be.fedict.eid.applet

Interface Runtime


  • public interface Runtime
    Interface for runtime component.
    Author:
    Frank Cornelis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Applet getApplet() 
      URL getDocumentBase() 
      String getParameter(String name)
      Gives back the parameter value for the given parameter name.
      void gotoAuthorizationErrorPage()
      Navigates the web browser to the authorization error page, if configured via the eID Applet parameters.
      boolean gotoCancelPage()
      Navigates the web browser to the cancel page, if configured via the eID Applet parameters.
      void gotoTargetPage()
      Navigates the web browser to the target page as configured on the eID Applet.

    • Method Detail

      • gotoTargetPage

        void gotoTargetPage()
        Navigates the web browser to the target page as configured on the eID Applet.

      • gotoCancelPage

        boolean gotoCancelPage()
        Navigates the web browser to the cancel page, if configured via the eID Applet parameters.
        Returns:
        true if cancel page was configured.

      • gotoAuthorizationErrorPage

        void gotoAuthorizationErrorPage()
        Navigates the web browser to the authorization error page, if configured via the eID Applet parameters.

      • getDocumentBase

        URL getDocumentBase()

      • getParameter

        String getParameter(String name)
        Gives back the parameter value for the given parameter name. Will map to the applet runtime parameters as set within the web browser where this applet is being run.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter.
        Returns:
        the value of the parameter, or null if not available.

      • getApplet

        Applet getApplet()
